item.title: The journey to a self-healing platform
item.description: Photo by Austin Kehmeier on Unsplash Hi guys, my first story is about my hobby project “OpenFero”. Open Fero is a little play on words from the Latin “opem fero”, which means “to help” and the term “OpenSource”. Hence the name “openfero”. The scope of OpenFero is a framework for self-healing in a cloud-native environment. Beginning of the journey In my ongoing time as a Kubernetes Platform Engineer, I’ve always wondered, “Isn’t there a solution to take the self-healing principle of Kubernetes further?
